Home.doc:
Main Link: Home

Description: Clicking on the 'Home' link will navigate you to the homepage of the Aga Khan University website.

How to Navigate:

Locate the 'Home' link in the navigation bar.
Click on the 'Home' link to be directed to the homepage.

About Us.doc:
Main Link: About Us

Description: Hovering over the 'About Us' link in the navigation bar will reveal a submenu with additional information about the Aga Khan University (AKU).

The submenu will appear, providing access to more details about AKU.
